abstract: Baseball's commissioner says he's confident M.L.B. will get back the money it loaned to the Mets.
snippet: Baseball's commissioner says he's confident M.L.B. will get back the money it loaned to the Mets.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - Commissioner Bud Selig said the Mets, who borrowed $25 million from Major League Baseball after last season, still had not paid back the loan. But Selig said he was not worried about getting the money back.

headline.main: Selig's Not Worried About the Mets
